name: Cyclops Puzzle
description: Encountering the cyclops and solving the puzzle by saying 'Ulysses'

entries.expectedOutput:
Cyclops Room
This room has an exit on the northwest and a staircase leading up.
A cyclops, who looks prepared to eat horses (much less mere adventurers), blocks the staircase. In his hand he carries a large, heavy sword.
The cyclops, hearing the name of his ancient nemesis, flees the room in terror.
entries.notes: Saying Ulysses causes the cyclops to flee

entries.expectedOutput:
Treasure Room
This is a large room, whose north wall is solid granite. A number of discarded bags, which crumble at your touch, are scattered about on the floor. There is an exit down a staircase and a dark, forbidding staircase leading up.
entries.notes: Can now access the treasure room
